text: A, di naha da! Yezdan bare we sivik kiriye, loma bi rasti Yezdan zaniye ku di nava we da (meriven) be wec hene. Idi heke ji we sed (meriven) hewdai hebin; we ewane li du sed (meriven file) servahatine bikin, u heke ji we hezar (meriven) hewdai hebin; we ewane bi dustura Yezdan li du hezar (meriven fileyen neyar) servahatine bikin. Loma bi rasti Yezdan bi hewdaran ra ne
